definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Not only do the police harass Omar but, he says, the Lebanese do as well.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔讲，不单是警察欺负他，黎巴嫩人也欺负他。

sentences.english: "Mullah Omar was killed on way from Quetta to North Waziristan, "TOLO television said in its news bulletin.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔在从基达前往瓦齐里斯坦北部的途中被击毙。

sentences.english: Omar and baby sister Fatima at the family home in Jeddah, 1990.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔和他的小妹妹在吉达的家中，于1990年。

sentences.english: Children like Omar wander the streets of Beirut all day long.
sentences.chinese: 象奥马尔这样的孩子整天游荡在贝鲁特的街上。

sentences.english: Omar to be done is to change this situation, so that these sites profitable.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔要做的，就是改变这种情况，让这些网站盈利。

sentences.english: The couple, Bin Laden's son Omar and his British wife Zaina, married in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 2007年，本拉登之子奥马尔迎娶了英国人扎娜。

sentences.english: Omar is a 14 year-old shoe shiner from Syria.
sentences.chinese: 奥马尔来自叙利亚，14岁，擦鞋。

definition: Husain or Hussein (name)/Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura/Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God/also written 穆罕默德
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
Anwar (name)/Anwar bin Ibrahim (1947-), Malaysian politician, deputy prime minister 1993-1998, imprisoned 1999-2004 on charges including alleged homosexual acts, subsequently overturned
Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
